summary: Unit tests for the TorchElasticEnvironment plugin in Lightning Fabric, covering extraction of configuration from environment variables, verification of default attribute values, detection of the TorchElastic runtime, and validation of user-provided settings.
business_intent: Guarantee that the TorchElasticEnvironment plugin reliably interprets TorchElastic environment variables and validates user configurations, enabling correct distributed training setup within the Lightning Fabric framework.
